p: The antioxidant effects of active compounds extracted from medicinal herbs including monotropein from Morinda officinalis How (Rubiaceae), astragalin (kaempferol 3- O-glucoside) from Cuscuta chinensis Lamark (Convolvulaceae) and spiraeoside from the outer scales of A. cepa (200 mg/kg, oral) on varicocele-induced Sprague-Dawley rats significantly improved parameters of oxidative stress such as MDA, SOD and GPx (Karna et al. 2019).
